tasks.label: limpiar
args: pushd "${workspaceFolder}" && del /f /q *.exe && del /f /q *.o && pushd src && del /f /q *.o && popd && popd

tasks.label: compilar y ejecutar
args: pushd "${workspaceFolder}" && del /f /q *.exe && pushd src && gcc *.c -I"${workspaceFolder}/include" -o "..\battleship.exe" && popd && popd
